Infer on Test Set

{% raw %}

infer_on_test_set[source]

infer_on_test_set(learn:Learner, path:Path, tta:bool=False, **kwargs)

Infers on test CSV at path using learn, optionally performing TTA.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
preds = infer_on_test_set(learn, path=test_csv_path, reorder=False)

# Test probabilities all sum to 1.
test_close(preds.sum(1), 1.)  # cnn_learner applies softmax after tta

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

<ipython-input-52-7129794a9115> in <module>
      2 
      3 # Test probabilities all sum to 1.
----> 4 test_close(preds.sum(1), 1.)  # cnn_learner applies softmax after tta

Format Submission

{% raw %}

format_submission[source]

format_submission(preds:Tensor, save_path:Union[Path, str])

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fake_preds = torch.zeros(1821, 4)
save_path = format_submission(fake_preds, "TESTING.csv"); save_path

Path('TESTING.csv')
{% endraw %}

All-in-One Learner -> Submission Function

{% raw %}

evaluate[source]

evaluate(learn:Learner, path:Path, name:str='submission.csv', tta:bool=False)

Evaluates learn on test CSV at path and saves as name, optionally applying TTA.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
